_header: Saint Benedict led holy life that was so holy man
Subjects: saints’ lives; Benedict of Nursia, saint, life of
_description: A variant of the Life of St. Benedict in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Benet ladde holy lyf þat was so holy MonÞe Ordre of
                    White Monkes furst stable he bigon…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now God for his swete loue vs graunte þulke
                    blisseÞat seint Benet is inne in heuene þat we þerof ne
                    misse. Amen.

CamFitzMc128.Transcription:
Saint benett lad ful god lif & was a holy manAnd the ordre of
                    white monkis he first to stable beganffrom ȝouth to his deth dayfull
                    holy life he laddeAnd the ordre of monkis white & her rewle he
                    raddeWel holy was his name & bettir was his dede

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Benet lad ful gode luf & was an holy manAnd þe ordre
                    of whyte monkes he first to stable began…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Þe xxj day of Marche of mydlerd he went y wisNow god for
                    þe love of hym vs alle bringe to his blisse
